title: How to Make a Baby Bottle for Reborns

steps.headline: Fill a plain plastic doll feeding bottle with warm water.
steps.description: Pour a few tablespoons of flour into the bottle.

steps.headline: It will clump together.
steps.description: Use a butter knife to push the flour down into the water. Put the little nipple part on the bottle.

steps.headline: Shake it up and you've got a very basic baby bottle.
Get together a bottle, detergent (white, not see through), yellow food coloring.
Select a doll feeding bottle and undo the lid.
Pour the detergent in the bottle.
Add a drop of yellow food coloring in the bottle.
Seal the lid.
steps.description: Use silicone glue or a divider for the nipple, to make sure it stays in place.

steps.headline: Feed your reborn.
steps.description: Don't actually feed this to the doll; just make it look like you are.

text: Simple Bottle Fill a plain plastic doll feeding bottle with warm water. Pour a few tablespoons of flour into the bottle. It will clump together. Use a butter knife to push the flour down into the water. Put the little nipple part on the bottle. Shake it up and you've got a very basic baby bottle.  Detergent Filler Get together a bottle, detergent (white, not see through), yellow food coloring.  Select a doll feeding bottle and undo the lid.  Pour the detergent in the bottle.  Add a drop of yellow food coloring in the bottle. Shake or stir to distribute. Seal the lid. Use silicone glue or a divider for the nipple, to make sure it stays in place. Put on the lid. Shake. Feed your reborn. Don't actually feed this to the doll; just make it look like you are.
sentences: Simple Bottle Fill a plain plastic doll feeding bottle with warm water.
Pour a few tablespoons of flour into the bottle.
Use a butter knife to push the flour down into the water.
Put the little nipple part on the bottle.
Shake it up and you've got a very basic baby bottle.
Detergent Filler Get together a bottle, detergent (white, not see through), yellow food coloring.
Select a doll feeding bottle and undo the lid.
Pour the detergent in the bottle.
Add a drop of yellow food coloring in the bottle.
Use silicone glue or a divider for the nipple, to make sure it stays in place.
Don't actually feed this to the doll; just make it look like you are.
